verses.verse: And of <S%H4480><s%> the blue, <S%H8504><s%> and purple, <S%H713><s%> and scarlet, <S%H8438><s%> <S%H8144><s%> they made <S%H6213><s%> cloths <S%H899><s%> of service, <S%H8278><s%> to do service <S%H8334><s%> in the holy <S%H6944><s%> place, and made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> the holy <S%H6944><s%> garments <S%H899><s%> for Aaron; <S%H175><s%> as <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H853><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

And he made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> the ephod <S%H646><s%> of gold, <S%H2091><s%> blue, <S%H8504><s%> and purple, <S%H713><s%> and scarlet, <S%H8438><s%> <S%H8144><s%> and fine twined linen. <S%H8336><s%> <S%H7806><s%>

And they did beat <S%H7554><s%> <S%H853><s%> the gold <S%H2091><s%> into thin plates, <S%H6341><s%> and cut <S%H7112><s%> it into wires, <S%H6616><s%> to work <S%H6213><s%> it in <S%H8432><s%> the blue, <S%H8504><s%> and in <S%H8432><s%> the purple, <S%H713><s%> and in <S%H8432><s%> the scarlet, <S%H8438><s%> <S%H8144><s%> and in <S%H8432><s%> the fine linen, <S%H8336><s%> with cunning <S%H2803><s%> work. <S%H4639><s%>
They made <S%H6213><s%> shoulder pieces <S%H3802><s%> for it, to couple it together: <S%H2266><s%> by <S%H5921><s%> the two <S%H8147><s%> edges <S%H7098><s%> was it coupled together. <S%H2266><s%>

And the curious girdle <S%H2805><s%> of his ephod, <S%H642><s%> that <S%H834><s%> was upon <S%H5921><s%> it, was of <S%H4480><s%> the same, <S%H1931><s%> according to the work <S%H4639><s%> thereof; of gold, <S%H2091><s%> blue, <S%H8504><s%> and purple, <S%H713><s%> and scarlet, <S%H8438><s%> <S%H8144><s%> and fine twined linen; <S%H8336><s%> <S%H7806><s%> as <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H853><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

And they wrought <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> onyx <S%H7718><s%> stones <S%H68><s%> enclosed in <S%H4142><s%> ouches <S%H4865><s%> of gold, <S%H2091><s%> graven, <S%H6605><s%> as signets <S%H2368><s%> are graven, <S%H6603><s%> with <S%H5921><s%> the names <S%H8034><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And he put <S%H7760><s%> them on <S%H5921><s%> the shoulders <S%H3802><s%> of the ephod, <S%H646><s%> that they should be stones <S%H68><s%> for a memorial <S%H2146><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> as <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H853><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

And he made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> the breastplate <S%H2833><s%> of cunning <S%H2803><s%> work, <S%H4639><s%> like the work <S%H4639><s%> of the ephod; <S%H646><s%> of gold, <S%H2091><s%> blue, <S%H8504><s%> and purple, <S%H713><s%> and scarlet, <S%H8438><s%> <S%H8144><s%> and fine twined linen. <S%H8336><s%> <S%H7806><s%>

It was <S%H1961><s%> foursquare; <S%H7251><s%> they made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> the breastplate <S%H2833><s%> double: <S%H3717><s%> a span <S%H2239><s%> was the length <S%H753><s%> thereof, and a span <S%H2239><s%> the breadth <S%H7341><s%> thereof, being doubled. <S%H3717><s%>

And they set <S%H4390><s%> in it four <S%H702><s%> rows <S%H2905><s%> of stones: <S%H68><s%> the first row <S%H2905><s%> was a sardius, <S%H124><s%> a topaz, <S%H6357><s%> and a carbuncle: <S%H1304><s%> this was the first <S%H259><s%> row. <S%H2905><s%>
And the second <S%H8145><s%> row, <S%H2905><s%> an emerald, <S%H5306><s%> a sapphire, <S%H5601><s%> and a diamond. <S%H3095><s%>
And the third <S%H7992><s%> row, <S%H2905><s%> a ligure, <S%H3958><s%> an agate, <S%H7618><s%> and an amethyst. <S%H306><s%>

And the fourth <S%H7243><s%> row, <S%H2905><s%> a beryl, <S%H8658><s%> an onyx, <S%H7718><s%> and a jasper: <S%H3471><s%> they were enclosed <S%H4142><s%> in ouches <S%H4865><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%> in their enclosings. <S%H4396><s%>

And the stones <S%H68><s%> were according to <S%H5921><s%> the names <S%H8034><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> twelve, <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> according to <S%H5921><s%> their names, <S%H8034><s%> like the engravings <S%H6603><s%> of a signet, <S%H2368><s%> every one <S%H376><s%> with <S%H5921><s%> his name, <S%H8034><s%> according to the twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> tribes. <S%H7626><s%>

And they made <S%H6213><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the breastplate <S%H2833><s%> chains <S%H8333><s%> at the ends, <S%H1383><s%> of wreathen <S%H5688><s%> work <S%H4639><s%> of pure <S%H2889><s%> gold. <S%H2091><s%>

And they made <S%H6213><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> ouches <S%H4865><s%> of gold, <S%H2091><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> gold <S%H2091><s%> rings; <S%H2885><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> <S%H853><s%> the two <S%H8147><s%> rings <S%H2885><s%> in <S%H5921><s%> the two <S%H8147><s%> ends <S%H7098><s%> of the breastplate. <S%H2833><s%>

And they put <S%H5414><s%> the two <S%H8147><s%> wreathen chains <S%H5688><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%> in <S%H5921><s%> the two <S%H8147><s%> rings <S%H2885><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> the ends <S%H7098><s%> of the breastplate. <S%H2833><s%>

And the two <S%H8147><s%> ends <S%H7098><s%> of the two <S%H8147><s%> wreathen chains <S%H5688><s%> they fastened <S%H5414><s%> in <S%H5921><s%> the two <S%H8147><s%> ouches, <S%H4865><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> them on <S%H5921><s%> the shoulder pieces <S%H3802><s%> of the ephod, <S%H646><s%> before <S%H413><s%> <S%H4136><s%> <S%H6440><s%> it.

And they made <S%H6213><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> rings <S%H2885><s%> of gold, <S%H2091><s%> and put <S%H7760><s%> them on <S%H5921><s%> the two <S%H8147><s%> ends <S%H7098><s%> of the breastplate, <S%H2833><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the border <S%H8193><s%> of it, which <S%H834><s%> was on <S%H413><s%> the side <S%H5676><s%> of the ephod <S%H646><s%> inward. <S%H1004><s%>

And they made <S%H6213><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> other golden <S%H2091><s%> rings, <S%H2885><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> them on <S%H5921><s%> the two <S%H8147><s%> sides <S%H3802><s%> of the ephod <S%H646><s%> underneath, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4295><s%> toward <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4136><s%> the forepart <S%H6440><s%> of it, over against <S%H5980><s%> the other coupling <S%H4225><s%> thereof, above <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4605><s%> the curious girdle <S%H2805><s%> of the ephod. <S%H646><s%>

And they did bind <S%H7405><s%> <S%H853><s%> the breastplate <S%H2833><s%> by his rings <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2885><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the rings <S%H2885><s%> of the ephod <S%H646><s%> with a lace <S%H6616><s%> of blue, <S%H8504><s%> that it might be <S%H1961><s%> above <S%H5921><s%> the curious girdle <S%H2805><s%> of the ephod, <S%H646><s%> and that the breastplate <S%H2833><s%> might not <S%H3808><s%> be loosed <S%H2118><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> the ephod; <S%H646><s%> as <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H853><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>
And he made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> the robe <S%H4598><s%> of the ephod <S%H646><s%> of woven <S%H707><s%> work, <S%H4639><s%> all <S%H3632><s%> of blue. <S%H8504><s%>

And there was a hole <S%H6310><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the robe, <S%H4598><s%> as the hole <S%H6310><s%> of a habergeon, <S%H8473><s%> with a band <S%H8193><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%> the hole, <S%H6310><s%> that it should not <S%H3808><s%> rend. <S%H7167><s%>

And they made <S%H6213><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the hems <S%H7757><s%> of the robe <S%H4598><s%> pomegranates <S%H7416><s%> of blue, <S%H8504><s%> and purple, <S%H713><s%> and scarlet, <S%H8438><s%> <S%H8144><s%> and twined <S%H7806><s%> linen.

And they made <S%H6213><s%> bells <S%H6472><s%> of pure <S%H2889><s%> gold, <S%H2091><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> <S%H853><s%> the bells <S%H6472><s%> between <S%H8432><s%> the pomegranates <S%H7416><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the hem <S%H7757><s%> of the robe, <S%H4598><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%> between <S%H8432><s%> the pomegranates; <S%H7416><s%>

A bell <S%H6472><s%> and a pomegranate, <S%H7416><s%> a bell <S%H6472><s%> and a pomegranate, <S%H7416><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%> <S%H5921><s%> the hem <S%H7757><s%> of the robe <S%H4598><s%> to minister <S%H8334><s%> in; as <S%H8334><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H853><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>
And they made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> coats <S%H3801><s%> of fine linen <S%H8336><s%> of woven <S%H707><s%> work <S%H4639><s%> for Aaron, <S%H175><s%> and for his sons, <S%H1121><s%>

And a miter <S%H4701><s%> of fine linen, <S%H8336><s%> and goodly <S%H6287><s%> bonnets <S%H4021><s%> of fine linen, <S%H8336><s%> and linen <S%H906><s%> breeches <S%H4370><s%> of fine twined linen, <S%H8336><s%> <S%H7806><s%>

And a girdle <S%H73><s%> of fine twined linen, <S%H8336><s%> <S%H7806><s%> and blue, <S%H8504><s%> and purple, <S%H713><s%> and scarlet, <S%H8438><s%> <S%H8144><s%> of needlework; <S%H4639><s%> <S%H7551><s%> as <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H853><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

And they made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> the plate <S%H6731><s%> of the holy <S%H6944><s%> crown <S%H5145><s%> of pure <S%H2889><s%> gold, <S%H2091><s%> and wrote <S%H3789><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> it a writing, <S%H4385><s%> like to the engravings <S%H6603><s%> of a signet, <S%H2368><s%> HOLINESS <S%H6944><s%> TO THE LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And they tied <S%H5414><s%> unto <S%H5921><s%> it a lace <S%H6616><s%> of blue, <S%H8504><s%> to fasten <S%H5414><s%> it on high <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4605><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the miter; <S%H4701><s%> as <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H853><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

Thus was all <S%H3605><s%> the work <S%H5656><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%> finished: <S%H3615><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> according to all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H853><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> they.

And they brought <S%H935><s%> <S%H853><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> <S%H853><s%> the tent, <S%H168><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> his furniture, <S%H3627><s%> his taches, <S%H7165><s%> his boards, <S%H7175><s%> his bars, <S%H1280><s%> and his pillars, <S%H5982><s%> and his sockets, <S%H134><s%>

And the covering <S%H4372><s%> of rams' <S%H352><s%> skins <S%H5785><s%> dyed red, <S%H119><s%> and the covering <S%H4372><s%> of badgers' <S%H8476><s%> skins, <S%H5785><s%> and the veil <S%H6532><s%> of the covering, <S%H4539><s%>
<S%H853><s%> The ark <S%H727><s%> of the testimony, <S%H5715><s%> and the staves <S%H905><s%> thereof, and the mercy seat, <S%H3727><s%>
<S%H853><s%> The table, <S%H7979><s%> and <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the vessels <S%H3627><s%> thereof, and the shewbread, <S%H3899><s%> <S%H6440><s%>

<S%H853><s%> The pure <S%H2889><s%> candlestick, <S%H4501><s%> with <S%H853><s%> the lamps <S%H5216><s%> thereof, even with the lamps <S%H5216><s%> to be set in order, <S%H4634><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the vessels <S%H3627><s%> thereof, and the oil <S%H8081><s%> for light, <S%H3974><s%>

And the golden <S%H2091><s%> altar, <S%H4196><s%> and the anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil, <S%H8081><s%> and the sweet <S%H5561><s%> incense, <S%H7004><s%> and the hanging <S%H4539><s%> for the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> door, <S%H6607><s%>

<S%H853><s%> The brazen <S%H5178><s%> altar, <S%H4196><s%> and his <S%H834><s%> grate <S%H4345><s%> of brass, <S%H5178><s%> <S%H853><s%> his staves, <S%H905><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> his vessels, <S%H3627><s%> <S%H853><s%> the laver <S%H3595><s%> and his foot, <S%H3653><s%>

<S%H853><s%> The hangings <S%H7050><s%> of the court, <S%H2691><s%> <S%H853><s%> his pillars, <S%H5982><s%> and his sockets, <S%H134><s%> and the hanging <S%H4539><s%> for the court <S%H2691><s%> gate, <S%H8179><s%> <S%H853><s%> his cords, <S%H4340><s%> and his pins, <S%H3489><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the vessels <S%H3627><s%> of the service <S%H5656><s%> of the tabernacle, <S%H4908><s%> for the tent <S%H168><s%> of the congregation, <S%H4150><s%>

<S%H853><s%> The cloths <S%H899><s%> of service <S%H8278><s%> to do service <S%H8334><s%> in the holy <S%H6944><s%> place, and <S%H853><s%> the holy <S%H6944><s%> garments <S%H899><s%> for Aaron <S%H175><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> and his sons' <S%H1121><s%> garments, <S%H899><s%> to minister in the priest's office. <S%H3547><s%>

According to all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H853><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the work. <S%H5656><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> did look upon <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the work, <S%H4399><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> they had done <S%H6213><s%> it as <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> had commanded, <S%H6680><s%> even so <S%H3651><s%> had they done <S%H6213><s%> it: and Moses <S%H4872><s%> blessed <S%H1288><s%> them.
